name: TerriableT20
description:
The Space Station 2020 has been infected by virus. Your job is to make to the spaceship and make it to the 2021 station. On your way to spaceship you have cure the people by throwing sanitizer ball at them.

Assets used in this game are from Unreal Engine Marketplace

Character: https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/cyberpunk-samurai

Environment Assets are from the monthly free assets that Epic Game provide: 

1. Scifi Kitbash Level Builder in Environments - UE Marketplace (unrealengine.com)

2.Modular Scifi Season 2 Starter Bundle in Environments - UE Marketplace (unrealengine.com)
